title: nameFormats
description: List of formats commonly used in this locale in various politeness levels and styles.

formal.description: Descriptions of name formats in the formal politeness level

short.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is the honorifics and the family name.

long.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is the honorifics, given, and family names.

normal.description: Descriptions of name formats in the normal politeness level

short.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is only the given name and a short family name.

medium.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is only the given name, middle names, and a short family name.

long.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is only honorifics, prefixes, given name, middle names, and the family name.

full.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale.  Typically, this is all the available parts of a person's name.

familiar.description: Descriptions of name formats in the familiar politeness level

short.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is only the given name, though in some locales it is the family name.

long.description: Order and spacing for a short version of a person's name in this locale. Typically, this is only given name, middle names, and a family name.
